content: Edited the description  a bit to remove the word "clipping". Nice little coding task for a Clash.

It seems a very nice puzzle for a CoC.  Just few comments.

The Line1 input is always ordered? They are in the examples but the description doesn't say it. If the order is guaranteed, the puzzle it's (slightly) simpler.

I believe it would be clearer to add the € symbol to the description:
"we use 1€ e 2€ coins, and 5€ .... "

Also, I was confused by the word "clipping" I don't think is a common word (I'm not a native English speaker, so may just be me) and could slow down the CoC participant.
Something like "denomination of notes/coins", or even the simpler "types of notes/coins".

Thank you for your comment !

Yes, I'm not a native English speaker me too and I had to use Google Translate for that name. I changed by noteTypes, it is simpler for everybody.
